In this connection Taiwan crated Anti-Tactical Ballistic Missile. But it seems it's going to be more an American test ground in Asia. Well, as I know Pentagon tested ray weapon lower-power. It can strike or be more exact paralyze enemy troops within range of 2 km. But now American has high-power ray weapon for longer distances and they are interested to test it. What if Chinese will be target?
